content: work blo skip 1 7 single_crochet 7 then work another strand without cutting the yarn chain 8 7 single_crochet cy-poleaving a long tail 15 crochet pattern by chiara cremon @chiacrafts https //www instagram com/chiacrafts https //www ravelry com/stores/chiara-cremon-designs here is how it should look using a tapestry needle pass the tail left through these bumps you find on your work the picture comes from elsa s pattern since i didn t take a good one for anna sew or glue the wig onto the head do the same with the bangs to style them take a good look at the following pictures leave a loop at the beginning and pass the needle through it at the very end thenpull it close secure and trim the tails left 16 crochet pattern by chiara cremon @chiacrafts https //www instagram com/chiacrafts https //www ravelry com/stores/chiara-cremon-designs cloak crochet hook 3 0 mm work normally work yo work with cherry yarn row1 chain 7 6 row2 6 increase 12 row3 1 single_crochet 1 increase x 6 18 row4 18 single_crochet 18 cy-po skip 6from the last st you made and start working again from the 7th row5 1 stsc 5 single_crochet 6 row6 6 single_crochet chain 2 7 of these 2 chains the first is an increase and the last is a tch the first of the 7 single_crochet of row7 should be worked in the first of the two second loop from hook row7 7 single_crochet chain 2 8 row8 8
